# Introduction

```{r libs, include = FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load libraries
library(bookdown)
library(ggmap)
library(gt)
library(here)
library(httr)
library(janitor)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(opendatatoronto)
library(readxl)
packageVersion("readxl")
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)

# Find and get data

questions <- search_packages("climate") %>% 
  list_package_resources() %>% 
  filter(grepl("Readme Data Field Names", name)) %>% 
  get_resource()

raw_data <- search_packages("climate") %>% 
  list_package_resources() %>% 
  filter(grepl("City of Toronto Climate Perceptions SPSS v1", name)) %>% 
  get_resource()

# Save data
write_csv(raw_data,"inputs/data/raw_data.csv")

# Read in data
all_data <- read_csv("inputs/data/raw_data.csv")
```
